name: The Spinning Puzzle
description:
This Game is for the #kenneyjam 2021.                                                                                        Theme: Rotation

In this game you have to guide a ball to the goal. You can rotate the board with A/D or <-/->.  Also you can zoom in and out a bit with the scrollwheel. The game has 20 levels, which are all possible and tested.

Have fun playing!

For Mac and Linux version:

I don't know if these working fine, because i can't test on these versions. The windows version should work just fine.
